name: bot
description: Prompts focused on prototyping helpers, automations, and playful bots.

sections.label: Trigger Story
prompts: What user pain or repetitive task is this bot meant to defuse?
Where will this automation comfortably live (CLI, browser, mobile, hardware)?
What signals tell me the bot is behaving as expected?

sections.label: Inputs & Signals
prompts: Which sources should feed data into the bot, and how will they arrive?
List guardrails that keep the bot from acting on wrong or stale input.
What manual override will I keep handy during early testing?

sections.label: Next Steps
prompts: Can I sketch the happy path in under 15 minutes and move to a quick experiment?
Where will I capture logs or side notes so the next session picks up smoothly?
Which collaborators need a short update before I ship this to a personal toolbelt?
